title: Breville Presents: Beer Drinker Food Thinker with Jeremy Sewall - Corn Waffle Recipe
description:
Chef Jeremy Sewall and Dan Kleban of Maine Beer create a warm corn and lobster salad served over a corn waffle. They pair this recipe with Maine Beer’s Peeper Ale. This is a perfect summer pairing. 

Get the recipe on Breville's Food Thinkers:
http://www.foodthinkers.com/corn-waffles-warm-lobster-salad/

Learn more about Breville:
